subject: Sex Crimes
Basketball
lead_paragraph: An affidavit filed in a slander suit against Syracuse University and Coach Jim Boeheim says that the wife of the fired assistant Bernie Fine had sex with players and that several people associated with the program knew about it, including Fine.
snippet: An affidavit filed in a slander suit against Syracuse University and Coach Jim Boeheim says that the wife of the fired assistant Bernie Fine had sex with players and that several people associated with the program knew about it, including Fine.
